snippet: Stocks drifted in afternoon trading as investors weighed data that showed weak U.S. retail sales data, and a batch of corporate deals and earnings news.
abstract: Stocks drift before ending mostly lower as Commerce Dept reports essentially flat retail sales in April, falling far short of forecasts.
lead_paragraph: Stocks drifted in afternoon trading as investors weighed data that showed weak U.S. retail sales data, and a batch of corporate deals and earnings news.

headline.main: Market Closes Mostly Flat After Weak Retail Sales Report
headline.print_headline: A Meandering Day Ends Not Far From Where It Began
